oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mountain City Inn
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of a postcard showing the Mountain City Inn. Men, women, and children are posed on the front porch. J. L. Loyd was the proprietor. The inn was built in the 1880s and torn down in the 1920s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Photographic postcards; Hotels
